## ContentAwareness.isLoggingEnabled() method

Check if the content awareness logging is enabled.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isLoggingEnabled(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

Returns true if the content awareness logging is enabled otherwise false.
